explains: v. 付还，偿还；报答，回报；值得付出（时间、努力等）

sentences.en: I'll repay the money I owe them next week.
sentences.cn: 我将在下个星期偿还欠他们的钱。

sentences.en: I can never repay your many kindnesses to me.
sentences.cn: 我无法报答你对我无微不至的关怀。

sentences.en: How can I ever repay you for your generosity?
sentences.cn: 你对我这样慷慨，我怎么才能报答你呢？
